posts.post_title: Looking for this exact card: T206 Cobb Green Portrait (See Pic)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff W.
This was my first pre war baseball card. Unfortunately, I traded it away to a fellow baord member and can't remember who it was. Anyways, if you have this card and wouldn't mind selling it for a profit, I would love to have it back. The money you make would be sufficient enough to buy the same card in a better grade.

[IMG]http://i60.photobucket.com/albums/h35/Comisky/DSC01786.jpg[/IMG]

Please email me at

jwilliams81@mac.com

Thanks
Jeff W.
